flawed_nl_solution:
The dress was $50 and 30% off so 50*0.3 = $<<50*0.3=15.0>>15.0 discount price
The dress cost $50 minus $15.0 (30% off discount) so 50-15.0 = $<<50-15.0=40.0>>40.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35.0, not 40.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
